title: (x) Super Natural Festival logo - Poster Bodoni {Lex, Marten F}
content:
This font kinda looks like cabernet.. but I’m not sure.  
What do you think it is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830092940im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/snf_5690.png)

 [‹ (x) Armored Saint "Nod to the Old School" CD track listing - Comic Sans {Sebastian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830092940/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38355 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Donovan Purcell "Cambridge Stone" book cover serif type - similar to Octavian {Florian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830092940/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38361 "Go to next forum topic")
author: di_ggler

comments.content:
It’s some sort of italic Didone, but I can’t find anything with that ’p’. Poster Bodoni Italic, Carousel Italic, Annlie Italic, and Didoni Italic are all close.

- Lex
You beat me to it, Lex!

A fat italic Bodoni … like [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830092940/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/normande/) or [that](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830092940/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bauer-bodoni/) one. Yet, the ‘p’ is special/custom.
